channel.title: Karizma (317) Development thread TODAY!@!@
channel.description:
Hello everyone im apocalypsePK as you can all tell and my very first source i made was okay but i never really got the full experience of making an amazing server. Now here i will be attempting to create a very stable and nice server along with my brother. We want to try to get a good start and maybe host the server a bit to get out all the bugs ect. Before i will release it, so here it is.
Note: to all the mods i will have pictures and more written stuff within 24 hours this is just the layout for what its going to look like for it to be easyier for me.
Also for anyone that finds spelling mistakes please correct me so I can fix, I want this to look really neat and good.
[size=18pt]LATEST UPDATE TODAY 3:43 am EST[/size]
[size=14pt]What im currently adding and what is going on I am sleeping cause im fkn tired ooo yes i said it. but never fear i will make you all jizz once you see it when its done here is the souce i will be basing it on http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,510548.0.html it is already a beast but not beastly enough for me! when its done you wont reconizze i spelt it wrong idc[/size]
(title) Karizma 317
(Intro) Welcome to karizma 317 This RSPS is coded from the first released PI. The reason why- I dont want to take someone elses source and code a bit and release it i want a challenge and to be able to say yeah.. i coded that or yeah i ripped that(lol). Anyways i want to code this and be proud of it, I want people to think and say good job i also want people to have fun while playing on it and encourage to make more and better this server is going to have everything i can possibley do everything that i have learned will be put into this. This is Karizma and it is awsome.
(What we are about) We arn't about the money nor anything like that me and my brother are only in this project to have fun and make a good server for everyone and while it is up people can have fun and have a little taste of Karizma. We only will be putting it online for a month to have fun with people and hopefully get all the bugs and glitches out of the server.
(Our goals) Our goals are to have a fair ammount of people on while it is on for that month and to make everyone happy. our other goals are to complete the server and have a good pking system while we will have dungeoneering and summoning.
(Pking/Economy) The pking is going to be great not the best as it would almost be impossible for me to get it like that but it is going to be really good perfect switches sara brews ect. all working while we will have a good stable economy and have no dupes or money glitches what so ever.
(Skills) All combats are 100% working prayer with the curses (thank my brother for this i dont know how he added lol call me a nub for that) Fishing 100% woodcutting 100% Fire making 100% Fletching 98% Rc 99% Crafting 99% Thieve 100% Herb 100% ( not like real rs but it is still 100% the way it works Farming 100% wor
(Features) Our current features are All chaotics added in properly (i only added in c staff and c bow as the others were already in the PI source) Dclaws Korasi (100%) working 100% magics exept for The lunar book only the veng other and veng will work.
(Currently added)
(Acomplishments)

item.title: Karizma (317) Development thread TODAY!@!@
item.dc:creator: @apocalypsePK apocalypsePK
item.description:
@apocalypsePK wrote:

[quote=“Ix Soulcist xI, post:6, topic:401525”]You have some minor errors concerning the grammar mistakes if talking about keep this development thread ‘clean’. Other than that, I’m quite interested in the name, can I ask where that name came from or was based off of?

Good luck with the development mate, I’m hoping there won’t be those terrible 508 + graphics, and if it states that there will be in the thread, apologies mate.[/quote]

kinda late to start it up again so ill be here for ever now. i had family issues and left my house for a year. im back now though so ill start it over.

as for the name, it was my old rs name untill it got perma banned 2 days ago “i’ve been home for 2 weeks”

Read full topic

item.title: Karizma (317) Development thread TODAY!@!@
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

You have some minor errors concerning the grammar mistakes if talking about keep this development thread ‘clean’. Other than that, I’m quite interested in the name, can I ask where that name came from or was based off of?

Good luck with the development mate, I’m hoping there won’t be those terrible 508 + graphics, and if it states that there will be in the thread, apologies mate.

Read full topic

Hello everyone im apocalypsePK as you can all tell and my very first source i made was okay but i never really got the full experience of making an amazing server. (title) Karizma 317

(Intro)
Welcome to karizma 317
This RSPS is coded from the first released PI. The reason why- I dont want to take someone elses source and code a bit and release it i want a challenge and to be able to say yeah… i coded that or yeah i ripped that(lol). Anyways i want to code this and be proud of it, I want people to think and say good job i also want people to have fun while playing on it and encourage to make more and better this server is going to have everything i can possibley do everything that i have learned will be put into this. This is Karizma and it is awsome.

(What we are about)
We arn’t about the money nor anything like that me and my brother are only in this project to have fun and make a good server for everyone and while it is up people can have fun and have a little taste of Karizma. We only will be putting it online for a month to have fun with people and hopefully get all the bugs and glitches out of the server.

(Our goals)
Our goals are to have a fair ammount of people on while it is on for that month and to make everyone happy.
our other goals are to complete the server and have a good pking system while we will have dungeoneering and summoning.

(Pking/Economy)
The pking is going to be great not the best as it would almost be impossible for me to get it like that but it is going to be really good perfect switches sara brews ect. all working while we will have a good stable economy and have no dupes or money glitches what so ever.

(Skills)
All combats are 100%
working prayer with the curses (thank my brother for this i dont know how he added lol call me a nub for that)
Fishing 100%
woodcutting 100%
Fire making 100%
Fletching 98%
Rc 99%
Crafting 99%
Thieve 100%
Herb 100% ( not like real rs but it is still 100% the way it works
Farming 100% wor

(Features)
Our current features are
All chaotics added in properly (i only added in c staff and c bow as the others were already in the PI source)
Dclaws
Korasi (100%) working
100% magics exept for The lunar book only the veng other and veng will work.

(Currently added)

(Acomplishments)

Read full topic
